articles.description: NEW YORK (AP) — Gloria Estefan sang a medley of her hits, Post Malone sang one of his forgotten gems, Teddy Riley swayed to New Jack Swing and Jeff Lynne rocked out to “Mr. Blue Sky” at the Songwriters Hall of Fame induction ceremony Thursday night.

articles.title: Not Even Touring Could Keep Suga From Playing ‘Diablo IV’ After Halsey ‘Lilith’ Collaboration - Rolling Stone
articles.description: In a recent behind-the-scenes video, the BTS member shared his excitement for the first main installment in the game series in a decade
articles.content: Suga of BTS has his priorities in order. Earlier this year, the musician shared his solo album D-Day, which took him across North America in April and May. He made the most of his time on that leg of… [+2089 chars]

articles.author: Eddie Fu
articles.title: Sigur Rós Announce ÁTTA, Their First New Album in a Decade - Consequence
articles.description: The digital version arrives tomorrow.
articles.content:
Sigur Rós have announced their new album, ÁTTA, out digitally this Friday, June 16th. A physical release will follow on September 1st.
ÁTTA marks the Icelandic group’s first album in nearly a decade… [+1358 chars]
